# wallet

**wallet-server** server side of wallet project. It implements service interface generated by wallet-proto and runs a gRPC server to handle client calls.

## Prerequisites
 - Gradle 4.10.2
 - Java 1.8
 - JPA
 - Hibernate 5.3.7.Final
 - JTA 1.1
 - c3p0 0.9.1.2
 - PostgreSql JDBC driver 42.2.5
 - SLF4J 1.7.9
 - JUnit 4.12
 - gRPC Testing 1.16.1
